preToolUse.description: Create backup before important file changes

postToolUse.name: suggest-missing-commands
postToolUse.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "command not found"; then MISSING_CMD=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -o '[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*: command not found' | cut -d: -f1 | head -1); echo "⚠️  コマンド '$MISSING_CMD' が見つかりません。"; echo "📋 他のコマンドを試す前に、まず以下でインストールしてください："; if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "tree"; then echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install tree"; elif echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "netstat"; then echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install net-tools"; elif echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "lsof"; then echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install lsof"; elif echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "htop"; then echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install htop"; elif echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "curl"; then echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install curl"; elif echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "wget"; then echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install wget"; elif echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_RESULT" | grep -q "git"; then echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install git"; else echo "   sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install $MISSING_CMD"; fi; echo "💡 インストール後に再度コマンドを実行してください。"; fi
postToolUse.description: コマンドが見つからない場合に明確なインストール指示を提示

postToolUse.name: lint-check
postToolUse.command: if [ -f package.json ]; then npm run lint --silent 2>/dev/null || echo 'Lint check completed (no lint script found)'; fi
